original_text: If the dough offered as firstfruits is holy, so is the whole lump, and if the root is holy, so are the branches.
korean_text: 제사하는 처음 익은 곡식 가루가 거룩한즉 떡덩이도 그러하고 뿌리가 거룩한즉 가지도 그러하니라

sentences.original_text: If the dough offered as firstfruits is holy
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 첫 열매로 드린 반죽이 거룩하다면

sentences.original_text: and if the root is holy
